pages.title: Glitch Fragments
pages.text: $(item)Unstable Glitch Fragments$() can be created by crushing a $(l:3_system_malfunction/0_system_glitches#heart)Corrupted Glitch Heart$() against an $(item)Obsidian Block$().$(br2)These $(item)Fragments$() are used to create $(item)Glitch Infused Ingots$().
